radiographic_examinations.findings: Few small biliary hamartomas in the liver; mild intrahepatic and extrahepatic bile duct dilation; common bile duct maximally measuring 9 mm; no obstructing intraductal stones; pancreas normal in signal and enhancement; dominant exophytic right lower pole simple renal cortical cyst measuring 10.2 cm; few scattered sub cm retroperitoneal lymph nodes; no ascites.
